Blogs/Drakon's-Chamberpot/Meet-Me-at-My-.filePath: Blogs/Drakon's Chamberpot/Meet Me at My Room~.md
Blogs/Drakon's-Chamberpot/Meet-Me-at-My-.title: Meet Me at My Room~
Blogs/Drakon's-Chamberpot/Meet-Me-at-My-.content:
Drakon’s Chamberpot - Posts

  



  You receive a new message:
  "Hey, come over to my room for some fun~ 💜💦"
  
    It's from Vallia! There's more messages with attachments incoming...
  


  🟣Full resolution on MEGA.



Vallia sends you a selfie, she’s standing in her bedroom wearing some cute lingerie.

  


Another selfie! Except…her lingerie’s revealing; her immense erection is on full display.

  


An extra follow up render.
I got lazy and didn’t bother with a background.

  



Some random lewd selfie style renders featuring my original character Vallia from my Baldur’s Gate 3 alternative universe. I introduced her briefly recently in this post. I’m hoping to better flesh out my characters and renders here on my blog here in future posts, but for now here’s some minimal context. I’ve also become notoriously bad at writing and giving context lately, Twitter has rotted my brain with it’s low character limits and lack of attention span. Time to practice my writing! Anyway, expect to see more immersion breaking renders featuring Tiefling Vallia. Baldur’s Gate 3 is probably gonna grip my creative brain for a bit.

Blogs/Firmly-Grasp-It/2025-07-02-Hey,-Ge.title: Hey, Getting Started – Just One Bulgy Pic for Now 👀
Blogs/Firmly-Grasp-It/2025-07-02-Hey,-Ge.content:
Firmly Grasp It - Posts

  This is lowkey just a post so that there's at least something I can see on
  this blog while I get things configured. I'm trying to keep the theme simple.
  I'll probably post pics and videos of myself here. 🍆 No promises though! 🤞

 
Bulge tax 💜

Recipes/Breakfast-Burrito-Filler.title: Breakfast Burrito Filler
Recipes/Breakfast-Burrito-Filler.content:
Breakfast Burrito Filler
Mix chip crumbs with eggs, beans, and cheese inside a tortilla for a crunchy breakfast burrito. Adds flavor and structure.

Recipes/Cheesy-Chip-Balls.title: Cheesy Chip Balls
Recipes/Cheesy-Chip-Balls.content:
Cheesy Chip Balls
Combine chip crumbs with cream cheese, shredded cheddar, and spices. Roll into bite-sized balls and coat with more crumbs for a crunchy exterior.

Recipes/Chip-Crusted-Avocado-Fries.title: Chip-Crusted Avocado Fries
Recipes/Chip-Crusted-Avocado-Fries.content:
Chip-Crusted Avocado Fries
Coat avocado slices in chip crumbs and bake or air fry. Serve with salsa, sour cream, or chipotle mayo.

Recipes/Crust-for-Chicken-or-Fish.title: Crust for Chicken or Fish
Recipes/Crust-for-Chicken-or-Fish.content:
Crust for Chicken or Fish
Crush tortilla chips finely and use as a coating for fried or baked chicken tenders, fish fillets, or tofu. A flavorful alternative to breadcrumbs or panko.

Recipes/Egg-Scramble-Crunch.title: Egg Scramble Crunch
Recipes/Egg-Scramble-Crunch.content:
Egg Scramble Crunch
Toss chip crumbs into scrambled eggs or omelets for a salty kick and added texture. Great with jalapeños or salsa.

Recipes/Index.title: Index
Recipes/Index.content: Start with Recipes. Check backlinks or graph view for more pages.

Recipes/Mexican-Pesto.title: Mexican Pesto
Recipes/Mexican-Pesto.content:
Mexican Pesto
Blend chip crumbs with cilantro, garlic, lime juice, and olive oil for a chip-inspired pesto. Use on tacos, grilled veggies, or sandwiches.

Recipes/Nacho-Dust-Popcorn.title: Nacho Dust Popcorn
Recipes/Nacho-Dust-Popcorn.content:
Nacho Dust Popcorn
Mix chip crumbs with melted butter and toss with popcorn for a nacho-flavored snack. Add a pinch of chili powder for extra kick.

Recipes/Queso-Dip-Thickener.title: Queso Dip Thickener
Recipes/Queso-Dip-Thickener.content:
Queso Dip Thickener
Stir chip crumbs into warm queso to thicken and add crunch. Perfect for dipping or spooning over nachos.

Recipes/Savory-Crumble-Topping.title: Savory Crumble Topping
Recipes/Savory-Crumble-Topping.content:
Savory Crumble Topping
Use chip crumbs in place of breadcrumbs in savory pies or gratins. Adds bold flavor and crunch.

Recipes/Soup-Garnish.title: Soup Garnish
Recipes/Soup-Garnish.content:
Soup Garnish
Top chili, tortilla soup, or black bean soup with chip crumbs for a satisfying crunch and extra flavor.

Recipes/Stuffed-Peppers-or-Mushrooms.title: Stuffed Peppers or Mushrooms
Recipes/Stuffed-Peppers-or-Mushrooms.content:
Stuffed Peppers or Mushrooms
Mix chip crumbs into the stuffing for peppers or mushrooms to add flavor and texture. Works well with cheese and beans.

Recipes/Taco-Salad-Crunch.title: Taco Salad Crunch
Recipes/Taco-Salad-Crunch.content:
Taco Salad Crunch
Sprinkle chip crumbs over taco salads or burrito bowls for added texture and flavor. Great for repurposing the bottom-of-the-bag bits.

Recipes/Tex-Mex-Breadcrumbs.title: Tex-Mex Breadcrumbs
Recipes/Tex-Mex-Breadcrumbs.content:
Tex-Mex Breadcrumbs
Use tortilla chip crumbs as a crunchy topping for casseroles, mac and cheese, or baked pasta. Adds a salty, zesty twist.

Recipes/Tortilla-Chip-Crumbs.title: Tortilla Chip Crumbs
Recipes/Tortilla-Chip-Crumbs.content:
Recipes
🗺️ Tortilla Chip Crumbs – Map of Content
A collection of creative ways to use leftover tortilla chip crumbs. Click through for savory, snacky, breakfast, and unexpected ideas.

Tex-Mex Breadcrumbs
Crust for Chicken or Fish
Taco Salad Crunch
Soup Garnish
Stuffed Peppers or Mushrooms
